     6  package parlfs

     8  import (
     9  	"io"
    10  	"io/fs"
    11  	"os"
    12  	"os/exec"
    13  	"path/filepath"
    14  
    15  	"github.com/haraldrudell/parl"
    16  )
    17  
    18  const (
    19  	mvCommand                                    = "mv"
    20  	mvNoClobber                                  = "-n"
    21  	defaultDirMode                               = 0o700
    22  	IsDirectoryNonExistentIsError IsDirectoryArg = 1 << iota
    23  	IsDirectoryNotDirIsError
    24  )
    25  
    26  type IsDirectoryArg byte
    27  
    28  func Mv(src, dest string, outConsumer func(string)) (err error) {
    29  	parl.Debug("Mv src: %s dest: %s\n", src, dest)
    30  	var bytes []byte
    31  	bytes, err = exec.Command(mvCommand, mvNoClobber, src, dest).CombinedOutput()
    32  	if len(bytes) != 0 && outConsumer != nil {
    33  		outConsumer(string(bytes))
    34  	}
    35  	if err != nil {
    36  		err = parl.Errorf("exec.Command mv: '%w'", err)
    37  	}
    38  	return
    39  }
    40  
    41  func Stat(path string) (fileInfo fs.FileInfo, err error) {
    42  	if fileInfo, err = os.Stat(path); err != nil {
    43  		err = parl.Errorf("os.Stat: '%w'", err)
    44  	}
    45  	return
    46  }
    47  
    48  // fileInfo: does exist, nil: does not exist
    49  func Exists(path string) (fileInfo fs.FileInfo /* interface */) {
    50  	var err error
    51  	fileInfo, err = os.Stat(path)
    52  	if err == nil {
    53  		return // does exist: fileInfo
    54  	}
    55  	if os.IsNotExist(err) {
    56  		return // does not exist: nil
    57  	}
    58  	panic(parl.Errorf("os.Stat: '%w'", err))
    59  }
    60  
    61  func IsDirectory(path string, flags IsDirectoryArg) (isDirectory bool, err error) {
    62  	fileInfo := Exists(path)
    63  	if fileInfo == nil {
    64  		if flags&IsDirectoryNonExistentIsError != 0 {
    65  			err = parl.Errorf("Does not exist: %s", path)
    66  		}
    67  		return
    68  	}
    69  	if isDirectory = fileInfo.IsDir(); !isDirectory && IsDirectoryNotDirIsError != 0 {
    70  		err = parl.Errorf("Not directory: %s", path)
    71  	}
    72  	return
    73  }
    74  
    75  func IsEmptyDirectory(path string) (isEmpty bool) {
    76  	file, err := os.Open(path)
    77  	if err != nil {
    78  		if os.IsNotExist(err) {
    79  			return false
    80  		}
    81  		panic(parl.Errorf("os.Open: '%w'", err))
    82  	}
    83  	defer func() {
    84  		if err := file.Close(); err != nil {
    85  			panic(parl.Errorf("file.Close: '%w'", err))
    86  		}
    87  	}()
    88  	_, err = file.Readdirnames(1)
    89  	if err != nil {
    90  		if err == io.EOF {
    91  			return true
    92  		}
    93  		panic(parl.Errorf("Readdirnames: '%w'", err))
    94  	}
    95  	return false // directory has files
    96  }
    97  
    98  // use 0 for default file mode owner rwx
    99  func EnsureDirectory(directory string, dirMode fs.FileMode) {
   100  	fileInfo, err := os.Stat(directory)
   101  	if err == nil {
   102  		if !fileInfo.IsDir() {
   103  			panic(parl.Errorf("Is not directory: %s", directory))
   104  		}
   105  		return // does exist, is directory
   106  	}
   107  	if !os.IsNotExist(err) {
   108  		panic(parl.Errorf("os.Stat: '%w'", err))
   109  	}
   110  	if dirMode == 0 {
   111  		dirMode = defaultDirMode
   112  	}
   113  	if err = os.MkdirAll(directory, dirMode); err != nil {
   114  		panic(parl.Errorf("os.MkdirAll: '%w'", err))
   115  	}
   116  }
   117  
   118  var i = 0
   119  
   120  func MoveOrMerge(src, dest string, outConsumer func(string)) (err error) {
   121  	i++
   122  	ii := i
   123  	parl.Debug("MoveOrMerge %d src: %s dest: %s\n", ii, src, dest)
   124  
   125  	// if dest does not exist, create dest’s parents and move src
   126  	fileInfo := Exists(dest)
   127  	parl.Debug("MoveOrMerge %d Exists complete\n", ii)
   128  	if fileInfo == nil { // destination does not exist: move the source
   129  		EnsureDirectory(filepath.Dir(dest), 0) // ensure parent directory exists
   130  		parl.Debug("MoveOrMerge %d outcome: mv\n", ii)
   131  		return Mv(src, dest, outConsumer) // move the directory
   132  	}
   133  
   134  	// ensure src and dest are both directories
   135  	var srcInfo fs.FileInfo
   136  	if srcInfo, err = os.Stat(src); err != nil {
   137  		parl.Debug("MoveOrMerge %s os.Stat\n", ii)
   138  		return
   139  	}
   140  	if !srcInfo.IsDir() {
   141  		parl.Debug("MoveOrMerge %d src !IsDir\n", ii)
   142  		return parl.Errorf("MoveOrMerge: source is file, dest exists: %s", src)
   143  	}
   144  	if !fileInfo.IsDir() {
   145  		parl.Debug("MoveOrMerge %d dst !IsDir\n", ii)
   146  		return parl.Errorf("MoveOrMerge: source is directory, dest is not: %s", src)
   147  	}
   148  
   149  	// merge src/* into dest
   150  	parl.Debug("MoveOrMerge %d merge\n", ii)
   151  	reader := NewDirStream(src, 0)
   152  	defer reader.Shutdown()
   153  	for entryPack := range reader.Results {
   154  		baseName := entryPack.Name()
   155  		if err = MoveOrMerge(
   156  			filepath.Join(src, baseName),
   157  			filepath.Join(dest, baseName),
   158  			outConsumer); err != nil {
   159  			parl.Debug("MoveOrMerge %d entry err\n", ii)
   160  			return
   161  		}
   162  	}
   163  	if IsEmptyDirectory(src) {
   164  		parl.Debug("EMPTY: %d %s\n", ii, src)
   165  		err = os.Remove(src)
   166  	} else {
   167  		parl.Debug("NOTEMPTY: %d %s\n", ii, src)
   168  	}
   169  	return
   170  }
